text: Harald von Boehmer (30 November 1942 â€“ 24 June 2018) was a German/Swiss immunologist.obituary notice He was best known for his work on T lymphocytes. Boehmer was elected a member of the Academia Europaea (1990), was elected as a Senior Member of the Institut Universitaire de France (1997), was awarded the Louis-Jeantet Prize for Medicine jointly with Nicole Le Douarin and Gottfried Schatz in Geneva (1990) and received an honorary Medical Degree from the University of Technology, Munich (2002). Boehmer retired at the end of 2012 and is guest professor in the Institute for Immunology of Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich from January 2013 until his death.Guest professor Harald von Boehmer in the Institute for Immunology in Munich ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:German doctors Category:Swiss physicians Category:Immunologists Category:Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich faculty Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Harald von Boehmer
